ygData.subject: Re: Animated Bait
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm then they have changed it - I had always lost my bait whenever I spilt my beer before. QdP ...   ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm then they have changed it - I had always lost my bait whenever I spilt
my beer before.
QdP

--- Gazamel Prime <gazamel@...> wrote:
> Spilled beer does not cause you to lose your bait.
> Only catching a fish does, or the phrase "You've lost
> your bait", which I saw a few times a LONG TIME ago,
> but haven't seen since.
>
> Gazamel Prime
> Solusek Ro
> Master Tinker
>
> --- Quasinom de Plume <eqmailing@...> wrote:
> >
> > All I believe it means is that you lose your bait.
> > If you fish and you
> > get the message "You didn't catch anything," you
> > still keep your bait.
> > But if you spill your beer then you lose your bait.
> >
> > QdP
> >
> >
> > --- Joe D <joed@...> wrote:
> > > On Sun, Dec 19, 1999 at 09:40:24PM -0500,
> > RPGMastr2k@... wrote:
> > > > From: RPGMastr2k@...
> > > >
> > > > Hrmm. Maybe if you tested it more it would even
> > out or something,
> > > hehe.
> > > > But...what does it mean when you spill your
> > beer?
> > >
> > > Sometimes while fishing, you get the message "You
> > spill you beer while
> > > bringing in your line". I've fished with beer in
> > my inventory, and I
> > > didn't
> > > lose any when that happened. I think it's just a
> > bit of color they
> > > tossed
> > > in.
> > >
> > > Joe D
> > >

> > <html>
